meanings.definition: A substance used to destroy or inhibit the growth of plants, especially weeds.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use herbicides to keep their fields free from pesky weeds.
meanings.sent2: The gardeners sprayed herbicides to prevent the growth of unwanted plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits tried to sabotage the herbicides by watering the weeds themselves.
meanings.sent4: The herbicides acted like a powerful shield, warding off any potential weed invaders.
meanings.sent5: The herbicides worked tirelessly, ensuring only the desired plants thrived in the garden.

meanings.definition: Chemicals used to control or kill unwanted vegetation.
meanings.sent1: The park maintenance crew applied herbicides to maintain the pristine look of the grass.
meanings.sent2: Invasive species were no match for the potent herbicides used by conservationists.
meanings.sent3: The herbicides played a game of hide and seek with the stubborn weeds in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The herbicides were like silent assassins, eliminating any unwanted plant growth.
meanings.sent5: The herbicides were the secret weapon in the battle against overgrown vegetation.
